page.title: 07VALE OF CLWYD GAME REARING.
page.content: Before shooting starts on Oct,1st, {pheasants}are fed wheat daily at certain places in the woods.In Jan,about 250 are caught & put in breeding pens_1 cock to 7 hens.They are fed wheat,maize & pellets.Eggs are collected 3 times daily from the beginning of April and are washed,disinfected and incubated.Hatching is 50% successful and takes 24 days.Chicks go into huts on woodshavings under infra_red lamps.The top beak is reduced with an electric de_beaker to prevent feather_ picking.From 3 days_3 wks,they are allowed an increasing area of 40ft,outside pens.At 2 wks,plastic bits are fitted to prevent cannibalism.These are removed at 6wks, when the birds go to large netting release pens,150yd,circumf,in the woods.They are free to feed & hide.
